entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is mentioned as the location where the Marauder's Map is being used to find out what Malfoy was doing.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is a magical object that allows Harry to see what Malfoy was doing.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who was being watched by Harry using the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: smith of hufflepuff
entities.description: Smith of Hufflepuff is a commentator who is being described by the dreamy voice.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The Quaffle is an object that Smith of Hufflepuff lost to Ginny Weasley.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is a person who took the Quaffle from Smith of Hufflepuff and is described as being very nice.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is a commentator who is described by Harry as having long, dirty-blonde hair and wearing a necklace of Butterbeer corks.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as being beside Luna Lovegood at the commentator's podium.
